sentences.sContent: His students are generally much better at bathtub dynamics by the end of his course, which gives him hope.
sentences.sContent_eng: His students are generally much better at bathtub dynamics by the end of his course, which gives him hope.
sentences.sCn: 在完成他的课程之后，他的学生对浴缸动力学的理解普遍好多了，这给了他希望。

sentences.sContent: And the neighbor down the street found in the bathtub… And the kid who ran his motorcycle into a tree an accident but for the note left behind saying that's exactly what he intended to do… And so on.
sentences.sContent_eng: And the neighbor down the street found in the bathtub… And the kid who ran his motorcycle into a tree an accident but for the note left behind saying that's exactly what he intended to do… And so on.
sentences.sCn: 还有那个街上的邻居，被人发现在浴缸里自杀了……还记着有个小年轻骑摩托车撞到了树上，大家认为这是个意外，但是这个小孩留的字条上说他是一心寻死的，等等。

sentences.sContent: Behind the bedroom were an old kitchen and a bathroom so small the toilet seat sometimes scraped against the bathtub.
sentences.sContent_eng: Behind the bedroom were an old kitchen and a bathroom so small the toilet seat sometimes scraped against the bathtub.
sentences.sCn: 卧室的后面是一个旧的厨房和一间浴室，浴室非常小，抽水马桶的盖子有时竞会碰擦到浴缸。

trans.tranOther: a long large container that you fill with water and sit or lie in to wash yourself
